    • Method Detail

      • downloadFile

        public static java.io.File downloadFile​(java.lang.String url,
                                        java.lang.String outputPath)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Downloads a file and saves it to the given location.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to download from
        outputPath - the path where to save the downloaded file
        Returns:
        the downloaded file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an errors occurs while writing the file or opening the stream

      • unzip

        public static void unzip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath,
                         java.lang.String outputLocation)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Unzips a file.
        Parameters:
        zipFilePath - input zip file
        outputLocation - zip file output folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading the zip file or writing the unzipped data

      • validateFile

        public static boolean validateFile​(java.io.File file,
                                   java.lang.String sha512Checksum)
        Validates a File against a SHA-512 checksum.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that has to be validated
        sha512Checksum - the checksum to validate against
        Returns:
        true if the file was valid, otherwise false

      • deleteRecursively

        public static boolean deleteRecursively​(java.io.File folder)
        Deletes a folder recursively. In case it deletes files on partially, files that had been deleted already will stay gone.
        Parameters:
        folder - will be deleted recursively
        Returns:
        true if successful, otherwise false
